item.title: Want to make the world a better place? Become an effective altruist
item.author: Louie Terrill,
item.description: Most of us want to make a difference and have a positive impact. Even the most selfish, money-and-status-seeking student has issues they care about. However, in such a complicated world it’s hard to know where to start. You may have a good heart, but without direction you might end up donating to …
